title: President Rajapakse’s lessons from the US-Resolution against Sri Lanka
content: – Shenali Waduge – The Rajapakse Government needs to take a reality check without delay. The US and allies inclusive of India are not concerned about the Sinhalese, Tamils, Muslims or how many died, disappeared or were resettled or the scale of development taking place. These are all smokescreens to hide the true agenda. They…
